price: They call upon none besides Him except female [idols][85]; they call upon none but a rebellious Satan[86]
arabic: إِن يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثٗا وَإِن يَدۡعُونَ إِلَّا شَيۡطَٰنٗا مَّرِيدٗا
footnotes:
[85] Arabs worshiped in the age of ignorance idols with female names, like: Lāt, ‘Uzzā, Manāt. See 53:19-20.
 [86] They only worship false idols because Satan seduced them into this.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: in yadʿūna min dūnihi illā ināthan wa-in yadʿūna illā shayṭānan marīdan
